document.docAuthor: Sousa, Francisco Diogo R., Elmoor-Loureiro, Lourdes M. A., Debastiani-Júnior, José Roberto, Mugnai, Riccardo & Senna, André
document.masterDocTitle: New records of Anthalona acuta Van Damme, Sinev & Dumont 2011 and Anthalona brandorffi (Sinev & Hollwedel, 2002) in Brazil, with description of a new species of the simplex - branch (Crustacea: Cladocera: Chydoridae)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: New records of Anthalona acuta Van Damme, Sinev & Dumont 2011 and Anthalona brandorffi (Sinev & Hollwedel, 2002) in Brazil, with description of a new species of the simplex - branch (Crustacea: Cladocera: Chydoridae)

subSubSection.paragraph:
Type locality.
Vicinity of São Paulo, Brazil (
Sars 1901
).

Lectotype .
Single parthenogenetic female, Zool. Mus. Oslo, Accession number
F 12338
a, Collection G.O. Sars, São Paulo, Brazil (Van Damme et al. 2011 ).

Material examined. Bahia. A parthenogenetic female from a pond in Roda Velha (
12 ° 47 ' 18 "S
,
45 ° 57 '06"W
), Bahia, Brazil , collected by LMAEL on
30.06 . 1985
, (EL00719). Nine parthenogenetic females from a pond in Nova Viçosa (
17 ° 53 ' 55 "S
,
39 ° 22 ' 7 "W
), Bahia, Brazil , collected by LMAEL on
22.01 . 1991
and
13.03 . 1995
, (EL00720, EL02213).

Distrito Federal. A parthenogenetic female from Paranoá Lake (
15 ° 46 ' 59 "S
,
47 ° 50 ' 53 "W
), Distrito Federal, Brasília , Brazil , collected by LMAEL on 0 1.01 . 1984 , (EL00742). Twenty-seven parthenogenetic females from Cedro Pond (
15 ° 53 ' 50.2 "S
,
47 ° 56 ' 37.7 "W
), Distrito Federal, Park Way, Brazil , collected by LMAEL on 03.04.2002 ; 07.06.2002 ;
14.01 . 2006
, (EL00721, EL00722, EL00759, EL00760). Two parthenogenetic females from Acampamento Dam (
15 ° 44 '53.0"S
,
47 ° 57 ' 49.1 "W
), Parque Nacional de Brasília , Distrito Federal, Brazil , collected by LMAEL on
27.05 . 2002
, (EL00724). Four parthenogenetic females from Bonita pond (
15 ° 35 ' 22.1 "S
,
47 ° 41 ' 50.1 ”W
), Ecological Station of Águas Emendadas, Planaltina, Distrito Federal, Brazil , collected by LMAEL on 0 3.05 . 2005 (EL00725). A parthenogenetic female from Recanto das Águas Stream (
15 ° 55 ' 21.25 "S
,
47 ° 58 ' 56.43 "W
), Park Way, Distrito Federal, Brazil , collected by Erivaldo Casado on
15.06 . 2005
, (EL00726). Fourteen parthenogenetic females from a pool at Botanic Horto (
15 ° 51 ' 39.48 "S
,
48 ° 1 ' 46.81 "W
), Universidade Católica de Brasília , Taguatinga, Distrito Federal, Brazil , collected by LMAEL on
24.04 . 2013
, (EL02385).

Goiás. Three parthenogenetic females from Meia-Lua Farm (
15 ° 50 ' 10 "S
,
48 ° 54 ' 28 " W
), Pirenópolis, Goiás, Brazil , collected by Valéria Barros on 0 4.06 . 2000 , (EL02231). Two parthenogenetic females from Capivaras pond (
18 ° 16.245 'S
,
52 ° 50.529 'W
), Emas National Park, Mineiros, Goiás, Brazil , collected by Guilherme Miranda on 0 9.07 . 2000 (EL00727). A parthenogenetic female from Macacos River (
14 ° 27 ’ 42.9 "S
,
47 °00’ 15.2 "W
), Paranã River Valley, Flores do Goiás, Goiás, Brazil , collected by LMAEL on
11.04 . 2003
, (EL00729). A parthenogenetic female from a pond in Paranã River valley (
15 °09’ 15.8 "S
,
47 ° 28 ’04.7"W
), Formosa , Goiás, Brazil , collected by LMAEL on
19.04 . 2003
, (EL00730). Thirteen parthenogenetic females from Jataí swamp in Paranã River valley (
15 °09’ 15.8 "S
,
47 ° 28 ’04.7"W
), Formosa , Goiás, Brazil , collected by Ciro Joko on
20.08 . 2003
, (EL00731). Sixteen parthenogenetic females from Jataí swamp in Paranã River valley (
15 °09’ 15.8 "S
,
47 ° 28 ’04.7"W
), Formosa , Goiás, Brazil , collected by LMAEL on
19.09 . 2004
, (EL00724). Ten parthenogenetic females from swamp in Paranã River valley (
14 ° 32 ’03.0"S
,
47 °01’ 50.1 "W
), Flores de Goiás, Goiás, Brazil , collected by LMAEL on 0 7.02 . 2005 , (EL00732). Two parthenogenetic females from swamp in Paranã River valley (
14 ° 32 ’03.0"S
,
47 °01’ 50.1 "W
), Flores de Goiás, Goiás, Brazil , collected by LMAEL on 0 7.02 . 2005 , (EL00733). Eleven parthenogenetic females from a pond in Paranã River valley (
14 ° 54 ’56.0"S
,
46 ° 57 ’02.9"W
), Flores de Goiás, Goiás, Brazil , collected by LMAEL on 0 7.02 . 2005 , (EL00733). Eigth parthenogenetic females from Feia Pond (
15 ° 34 ' 25.05 "S
,
47 ° 18 '9.00"W
), Instruction Field of the Brazilian Army, Formosa , Goiás, Brazil , collected by LMAEL on
12.12 . 2009
, (EL01758). A parthenogenetic female from Grande Pond (
15 ° 49 ' 59.29 " S
,
47 ° 13 ' 55.42 "W
), Instruction Field of the Brazilian Army, Formosa , Goiás, Brazil , collected by GEEA on 0 7.08 . 2009 , (EL01751). Five parthenogenetic females, two males and one ephipial female from Pond at Parque Nacional da Chapada dos Veadeiros (
14 ° 6 ' 5.84 "S
,
47 ° 42 ' 4.89 "W
), Alto Paraíso, Goiás, Brazil , collected by GEEA on
17.12 . 2012
, (EL02238). A parthenogenetic female from Pond at Parque Nacional da Chapada dos Veadeiros (
14 ° 6 ' 8.57 "S
,
47 ° 42 ' 7.35 "W
), Alto Paraíso, Goiás, Brazil , collected by GEEA on
17.12 . 2012
, (EL02266). Eight parthenogenetic females from Pond at Parque Nacional da Chapada dos Veadeiros (
14 ° 6 ' 8.37 "S
,
47 ° 42 ' 12.32 "W
), Alto Paraíso, Goiás, Brazil , collected by GEEA on
17.12 . 2012
, (EL02268). Thirty six parthenogenetic females from Sete Lagoas Pond (
14 °04'26,5"S
,
47 ° 39 '40,7"W
), Parque Nacional da Chapada dos Veadeiros, Alto Paraíso, Goiás, Brazil , collected by GEEA on
18.06 . 2012
and
14.03 . 2013
, (EL02299, EL02363).

Maranhão. Three parthenogenetic females from Azalão Pond (
2 º 39 ' 34 "S
,
42 º 39 ' 55 "W
), Lençóis Maranhenses, Maranhão, Brazil , collected by Odete Rocha on
28.11 . 1996
, (EL01578). Ninety parthenogenetic females from Pond at Tutoia, Caju Island (
2 º 43 ' 38 "S
,
42 º04' 44 "W
), Maranhão, Brazil , collected by Maria do Socorro Ibañez on 0 1.03 . 1999 , (EL02135).

Minas Gerais. Two parthenogenetic females from Jatobá Pond (
14 ° 56 ' 13 "S
,
44 ° 37 ' 35 "W
), Parque Estadual Veredas do Peruaçú, Januária, Minas Gerais, Brazil , collected by Maria Beatriz Gomez e Sousa on 0 1.09 . 2003 , (EL01979). Two parthenogenetic females from Vereda do Peruaçú (
14 ° 55 ' 58 "S
,
44 ° 34 ' 49 "W
), Parque Estadual Veredas do Peruaçú, Januária, Minas Gerais, Brazil , collected by Maria Beatriz Gomez e Sousa on 0 1.09 . 2003 , (EL01970). A parthenogenetic female from Formosa Pond (
14 ° 55 ' 58 "S
,
44 ° 34 ' 49 "W
), Parque Estadual Veredas do Peruaçú, Januária, Minas Gerais, Brazil , collected by Maria Beatriz Gomez e Sousa on
25.03 . 2003
, (EL01984). Two parthenogenetic females from Preto River (
17 ° 55 ' 6.20 "S
,
43 ° 48 ' 50.36 "W
), Parque Nacional das Sempre Vivas, Bocaiúva, Minas Gerais, Brazil , collected by Adriana Fernandes on 0 2.05 . 2010 , (EL02409). Two ephipial females and one male from Carrascão Pond (
17 ° 56 ' 34.73 "S
,
43 ° 49 ' 49.76 "W
), Parque Nacional das Sempre Vivas, Bocaiúva, Minas Gerais, Brazil , collected by Adriana Fernandes on 0 5.05 . 2010 , (EL01873). Seven parthenogenetic females from Redonda Pond (
17 º 46 ' 39 "S
,
43 º 36 ' 59 "W
), Parque Nacional das Sempre Vivas, Bocaiúva, Minas Gerais, Brazil , collected by Adriana Fernandes on 0 6.05 . 2010 , (EL02406). Four parthenogenetic females from Silipe River (
17 ° 29 ’S
,
43 ° 21 ’W
), Parque Nacional das Sempre Vivas, Bocaiúva, Minas Gerais, Brazil , collected by GEEA on 0 7.09 . 2010 , (EL02410).

Mato Grosso do Sul. A parthenogenetic female from Garças Pond (
22 ° 43 ' 33 "S
,
53 ° 13 ' 34 "W
), Boitaporã, Mato Grosso do Sul, Brazil , collected by LMAEL on
26.09 . 2009
, (EL01763).

Mato Grosso. Thirteen parthenogenetic females from the vicinity of Poconé (
16 ° 21 ' 36 "S
,
56 ° 38 ' 48 "W
), Mato Grosso, Brazil , collected by LMAEL on 0 2.02 . 1986 , (EL00735, EL00736). Nineteen parthenogenetic females from swamp at Santo Antônio do Levenger (
15 ° 50 ' 26 "S
,
56 ° 4 ' 33 "W
), Mato Grosso, Brazil , collected by LMAEL on
26.07 . 1988
, (EL00737).

Pará. Fourteen parthenogenetic females and one male from Serra dos Carajás (
6 ° 24 ' 30.3 "S
,
50 ° 21 ' 4.4 "W
), Carajás, Pará, Brazil , collected by Reinaldo Luiz Bozzeli on 0 8.05 . 2005 , (EL00738).

Pernambuco. Two parthenogenetic females from Dama at Escada (
8 ° 19 ' 30 "S
,
35 ° 14 ' 21.5 "W
), Pernambuco, Brazil , collected by LMAEL on
23.12 . 1989
, (EL01574).

Paraná. A parthenogenetic female from Pond in Curitiba (
25 ° 31 ' 46 "S
,
49 ° 13 ' 19 "W
), Paraná, Brazil , collected by LMAEL and Gilmar Perbiche-Neves on
18.02 . 2008
, (EL02129). A parthenogenetic female from Ressaco do Pau Véio (
2 ° 44 ' 54 "S
,
53 ° 15 ' 25 "W
), Porto Rico , Paraná, Brazil , collected by LMAEL on
26.03 . 2009
, (EL02128). Thirty parthenogenetic females from Ressaco do Leopoldo (
22 ° 45 ' 27 "S
,
53 ° 16 ' 16 "W
), Porto Rico , Paraná, Brazil , collected by LMAEL on
26.03 . 2009
, (EL02047).

Rio de Janeiro. One hundred and thirty parthenogenetic females from Cabiúnas pond (
22 ° 18 ’S
,
41 ° 42 ’W
), Macaé, Rio de Janeiro, collected by Paloma Lopes on 0 1.06 . 2004 , (EL00739).

Santa Catarina. Twenty-five parthenogenetic females from Mapiju farm (
27 ° 41 ' 30 "S
,
48 ° 46 ' 55 "W
), Imperatriz, Santa Catarina, Brazil , collected by Gilberto Pereira Júnior on
27.09 . 2001
, (EL02185).

São Paulo. Seventeen parthenogenetic females from Lagoa do Coqueiral (
23 ° 29 ' 22.64 "S
,
48 ° 37 ' 6.65 "W
), Angatuba, São Paulo, Brazil , collected by Silvia M. C. Casanova and LMAEL on
22.01 . 2002
and
30.01 . 2001
, (EL00740, EL02348).
Comments. See Van Damme et al. ( 2011 ) for descriptions and diagnosis.

Distribution and ecology.
Anthalona verrucosa verrucosa
has a wide distribution range in Brazil (
Fig. 6
C). This species was found in several types of water bodies such as streams, rivers, dams, reservoirs, lakes and swamps. According to Van Damme et al. ( 2011 ), this species may be associated with a lower acidity water but prefers neutral environments.
